## ThirdwebSDK.overrideStorage() method

Allows you to override the storage used across the SDK.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
overrideStorage(storage: IStorage): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  storage | [IStorage](./sdk.istorage.md) | The Storage instance to use. |

<b>Returns:</b>

void
